name: MiboSmart
0:
”Alexa, show the front door”
”Alexa, show the living room”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"With an Intelbras camera, you can stay with what you care anywhere anytime. From now on, simply ask your Echo show to bring up the live view of your Intelbras camera. Free your hands and enjoy a smarter life!

To get started with the Mibo Smart skill:
1.Log into your Mibo Smart APP and name your camera (for example, living room, front door, etc. ).
2.From the Alexa app, find and enable Mibo Smart skill, login with your Mibo Smart account.
3.Tap DISCOVER DEVICES in Alexa APP to discover your Intelbras cameras.

After linking your Mibo Smart account and discovering your Intelbras cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming live video to your Echo Show with commands like:
- ""Alexa, show the front door""
- ""Alexa, show the living room""
To stop your Intelbras camera from streaming video, you can say:
- ""Alexa, stop""

Compatible Amazon Alexa devices:
* Echo Show
* Echo Spot
* Fire TV
* Fire TV Cube
* Fire TV stick (2nd gen)
* Fire TV Edition smart TVs
* Fire Tablets (7th gen and above)

Important Notes：
1. Before streaming your Intelbras camera, please make sure the Video Encryption is not enabled.
2. Please note that two-way talk is only available within the Mibo Smart App
3. When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of your camera.

More information is available at https://www.intelbras.com.br
If you have any questions about Intelbras Skill, please contact Intelbras Support: suporte@intelbras.com.br"
